title: U.K. Tabloid 'The Sun' Ends Topless Tradition
teaser: Britain's most popular newspaper will reportedly stop featuring photos of topless women on its pages. The Sun began its "Page 3" pictures 44 years ago, but there has long been criticism of the feature, which critics say objectifies women.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
